check_in.title: Baseline Check-In
check_in.description: Open MDS and record your starting mood + intention for digital discipline in 1 sentence.

main_challenge.title: First 30 Minutes Phone-Free
main_challenge.description: Do not touch your phone for the first 30 minutes after waking. Start the in-app timer as soon as you wake.

check_in.title: No-Scroll Breakfast
check_in.description: Keep your phone out of reach during breakfast (or your first meal).

main_challenge.title: Notification Audit
main_challenge.description: Disable non-essential notifications for 3 apps you use most (social, news, entertainment).

check_in.title: Single-Task Rule
check_in.description: For 1 hour today, do only one activity at a time—no parallel scrolling.

main_challenge.title: Social App Time Cap
main_challenge.description: Set a daily limit for 1 social app (e.g., 30 minutes). Keep it for the rest of the day.

check_in.title: Quiet Pocket
check_in.description: Keep your phone on silent for 3 hours (no vibration).

main_challenge.title: Inbox Zero Sprint
main_challenge.description: Pick ONE inbox (email/WhatsApp). Clear it for 25 minutes, then stop—no endless catch-up.

check_in.title: No-Phone Toilet Rule
check_in.description: No phone in the bathroom today. Leave it outside.

main_challenge.title: Two-Block Phone-Free
main_challenge.description: Complete two separate 60-minute phone-free blocks (any time). Start timer each block.

check_in.title: App Graveyard
check_in.description: Identify 1 app you rarely use but often open. Move it off your home screen.

main_challenge.title: Unfollow 10 Triggers
main_challenge.description: Unfollow/unsubscribe from 10 accounts/pages that trigger doom-scrolling or comparison.

check_in.title: One-Tab Discipline
check_in.description: Use only one browser tab at a time for 30 minutes.

main_challenge.title: Evening Screen Sunset
main_challenge.description: No entertainment scrolling 90 minutes before sleep. Replace with a calm offline routine.

check_in.title: Pocket Check
check_in.description: Count how many times you reach for your phone without a reason. Log the number once.

main_challenge.title: No-Feed Daylight
main_challenge.description: No social feeds before 12:00 noon (local). Messaging/calls allowed.

check_in.title: Notification-Free Hour
check_in.description: Choose 1 hour today: phone stays on Do Not Disturb.

main_challenge.title: Delete 200 Photos
main_challenge.description: Clean your camera roll: delete at least 200 unnecessary photos/screenshots.

check_in.title: Mindful Unlock
check_in.description: Before each unlock, pause 2 seconds and ask: 'Why am I unlocking?'

main_challenge.title: No Video Auto-Play
main_challenge.description: Turn off auto-play (YouTube/TikTok/Instagram) OR commit to manually selecting each video today.

check_in.title: Phone Parking Spot
check_in.description: Designate a 'phone parking spot' at home. Keep it there whenever you’re not using it.

main_challenge.title: One Social Window
main_challenge.description: Use social media only in ONE planned window (max 30 minutes). No random checks.

check_in.title: No Bed Scroll
check_in.description: Phone stays out of bed. If you catch yourself, stop immediately and log it.

main_challenge.title: Conversation First
main_challenge.description: Have one 10-minute conversation today with no phone present (in-person or call).

check_in.title: 3-Minute Breath Reset
check_in.description: When you feel the urge to scroll, do a 3-minute breathing reset once today.

main_challenge.title: 24-Hour No-Posting
main_challenge.description: Do not post on any social platform for 24 hours. Messaging allowed.

check_in.title: Declutter 1 Folder
check_in.description: Clean one folder: downloads, screenshots, or files. Delete 20 items minimum.

main_challenge.title: Half-Day Digital Sabbath
main_challenge.description: Choose a 6-hour window today: no social media, no entertainment, no news. Calls/messages allowed.

check_in.title: No Multiscreen
check_in.description: No using phone while watching TV today. Keep it out of reach.

main_challenge.title: Deep Work Block
main_challenge.description: Complete a 90-minute deep work block with phone in another room. Start timer.

check_in.title: One Purpose Unlock
check_in.description: For 10 unlocks today, state your purpose out loud (or in-app tap).

main_challenge.title: Unsubscribe 10
main_challenge.description: Unsubscribe from 10 email lists that constantly pull you back online.

check_in.title: No Phone in Meetings
check_in.description: In any meeting (work, family, religious), keep phone face down or away.

main_challenge.title: Evening App Swap
main_challenge.description: Replace 30 minutes of evening scrolling with a deliberate offline activity (walk, book, chores). Log which.

check_in.title: Two-Check Rule
check_in.description: Check messages only twice today for non-urgent chats (pick two time slots).

main_challenge.title: Dopamine Menu
main_challenge.description: Write a 5-item 'dopamine menu' of offline rewards and use one today instead of scrolling.

check_in.title: Greyscale Trial
check_in.description: Turn on greyscale for 2 hours today.

main_challenge.title: No-Feed Commute
main_challenge.description: During any commute/transport today, no feeds. Observe surroundings or listen to audio only.

check_in.title: Scroll Trigger Spotting
check_in.description: Name your top trigger (boredom, stress, loneliness, curiosity). Record it.

check_in.title: Home Screen Minimal

main_challenge.description: All meals today: phone not on the table. If alone, keep phone away.

check_in.description: When you want to search something, write it in a note first. Search later.
